# pkgTesting

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Author: Adam Coger

This package is to hold a Shiny app for making and viewing graphs about COVID-19 in the United States.

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
#this is unfinished, so I don't recommend it yet
devtools::install_github("monkeychex3/pkgTesting")
```

this package was built using COVID19::covid19() from https://covid19datahub.io
